name: FreeCodeCamp
description: I've used FreeCodeCamp to self study JavaScript, HTML, and CSS through a variety of smaller demos and practice project curriculums on the website's open source coursework.

name: JavaScript Mastery
description: A repository of the free tutorial projects from https://www.youtube.com/c/JavaScriptMastery used for the purpose of self study. A small collection of CRUD applications using JavaScript and its common libraries (primarily ReactJS, Node.js and Express middleware).
